SQL_Query: SELECT TRACK_NAME,STREAMS FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ARTIST_NAME = 'Taylor Swift' ORDER BY STREAMS DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOTIFY WHERE BPM > 120
SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME, BPM FROM SPOTIFY WHERE BPM > 120 ORDER BY BPM DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ENERGY_PERCENT > 70
SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME, ENERGY_PERCENT FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ENERGY_PERCENT > 70 ORDER BY ENERGY_PERCENT DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ARTIST_COUNT=1
SELECT TRACK_NAME,ARTIST_NAME FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ARTIST_COUNT=1 ORDER BY STREAMS DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ARTIST_COUNT>1
SELECT TRACK_NAME,ARTIST_NAME FROM SPOTIFY WHERE ARTIST_COUNT>1 ORDER BY STREAMS DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME, DANCEABILITY_PERCENT FROM SPOTIFY ORDER BY DANCEABILITY_PERCENT DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT TRACK_NAME, VALENCE_PERCENT FROM SPOTIFY ORDER BY VALENCE_PERCENT DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME  FROM SPOTIFY  WHERE IN_{platform}_CHARTS=1  ORDER BY IN_{platform}_PLAYLISTS DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME  FROM SPOTIFY
               WHERE (IN_SPOTIFY_CHARTS=1 AND IN_APPLE_CHARTS=1) OR (IN_SPOTIFY_CHARTS=1 AND IN_DEEZER_CHARTS=1) OR (IN_APPLE_CHARTS=1 AND IN_DEEZER_CHARTS=1)
               ORDER BY STREAMS DESC

SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME FROM SPOTIFY
            WHERE IN_SPOTIFY_CHARTS=1 AND IN_APPLE_CHARTS=1 AND IN_DEEZER_CHARTS=1
SELECT AVG(VALENCE_PERCENT) AS AVERAGE_VALENCE, AVG(DANCEABILITY_PERCENT) AS AVERAGE_DANCEABILITY FROM SPOTIFY

WITH top_songs AS (
        SELECT *
        FROM SPOTIFY
        ORDER BY STREAMS DESC
        LIMIT 10
        )
        SELECT
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE VALENCE_PERCENT > {ave_valence}) AS valence_count,
        COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE DANCEABILITY_PERCENT > {ave_dance}) AS dance_count
        FROM top_songs
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SPOTIFY ORDER BY RELEASED_YEAR DESC

SELECT RELEASED_YEAR, COUNT(*) AS SONG_COUNT
        FROM SPOTIFY
        GROUP BY RELEASED_YEAR
        HAVING COUNT(*) = (
            SELECT MAX(song_count)
            FROM (
                SELECT COUNT(*) AS song_count
                FROM SPOTIFY
                GROUP BY RELEASED_YEAR
                   ) AS counts
               )
SELECT ARTIST_NAME, COUNT(*) AS SINGER_COUNT FROM SPOTIFY WHERE RELEASED_YEAR={year} GROUP BY ARTIST_NAME ORDER BY SINGER_COUNT DESC

SELECT TRACK_NAME, ARTIST_NAME, STREAMS  FROM SPOTIFY
        WHERE STREAMS =
                (SELECT MAX(STREAMS)
                    FROM SPOTIFY)
